1.content:
Professor Oak took one last glance at his lab as he hops in the taxi cab. With Tracey currently feeling under the weather, and Gary off in some distant land doing research, Ash was the only one he could ask to look after all of the Pokemon. He sighed and hoppped in the cab, driving off and leaving the lab away from his sight.

Ash leaped into the air and lands on the couch in the lab, staring up at the ceiling as Pikachu joined his side.

"What a great 16th birthday present, Pikachu!" Ash cheered. "Professor Oak is gone for the week, and we've got the entire lab to ourselves!"

"Pika!" Pikachu said as looked over at his trainer.

"I've got a great idea!" Ash announced. "Let's have a party! We'll invite Misty, Brock, May, Max, Dawn, Richie, and even that jerk Paul! We'll invite everyone but Gary, seeing how we don't even know where he is right now."

Pikachu cheered as Ash ran to a phone and made the call to everyone. Sure enough, everyone came from their locations by air, land and sea, arriving by late evening. Ash invited everyone inside, where snacks and drinks had been set out. They cranked up some music and soon everyone was having a great time, even people whom normally didn't get along well with Ash.

While the humans partied their cares away inside, all of the Pokemon had been released to the outside pastures, where they had fun themselves.

It was about five in the morning when the party died down. Ash allowed everyone to spend the night at the lab, and now everyone was asleep. However, all of the Pokemon were still awake. While they all had a party of their own, they never actually ate anything. Ash had forgotten to feed them, and they were all starving after wasting their energy in Pokemon-related games and activities.

"This is outrageous, even for him!" Bulbasaur announced in his native tongue. "We need to eat!"

"Come on, he just forgot," Pikachu replied.

"Perhaps, but Oak never fed us last night because he had let a large meal out for Ash to feed us tonight!" Tauros grumbled.

"Hey guys, that wouldn't happen to be it, would it?" Sparky questioned, pointing at a nearly cleaned-out table inside. "I think that Brock guy ate it all!"

"What?!" the Pokemon gasped.

All of the Pokemon in the pasture gathered around.

"He even ate the food we left for the rest of the week!" Muk grumbled. "Now we don't have anything to eat!"

Richie's Charmeleon approached the group.

"Actually, we do," he stated. "We have this entire town!"

"What are you saying?" Pikachu gasped.

"If these humans are so willing to eat our food as well as their own, and forget all about us, maybe they don't deserve to be our trainers!" Zippo replied. "It's time we restored our rightful place as masters! I've heard humans are very nutritious!"

"We can't!" Pikachu shouted.

"We must!" Zippo replied. "Pikachu, it's us or them! You're either the hunter, or the hunted! Which do you choose?"

Pikachu shuddered as all of th Pokemon surrounded them, all looking very hungry.

"All right, I'm in!" he sighed.

The Pokemon all cheered as Ash's Tauros broke down the barricades surrounding the pasture, releasing all of the Pokemon into the city. The humans inside the lab all began to wake up after hearing a mysterious sound.

Now, whose point of view would like to tell the story from?
1.title: Beginning of the Nightmare

choices: Decide to leave him and go after another human.
Decide to leave and go after a Pokemon that won't join.
Betray the Pokemon and fight against them.
Go and observe the others without actually doing anything yet.
11.content:
You see through the eyes of Pikachu and watch the hundreds, if not thousands of Pokemon flee from the compound. You sit and wonder what to do. With several bird Pokemon flying above and keeping an eye on you, you realize you must make a decision. You wonder if you should be the one to eat Ash.

"I'm his best friend, it makes sense," you think. "He'll never forgive me, but if I don't, another Pokemon will. What do I do? I'm being watched!"

You turn back to the lab, where Ash steps outside, half-asleep.

"Pikachu?" he says.

"Pika!" you reply.

"Keep it down, would ya?" Ash asks as he yawns.

He's still too tired to notice what has happened and heads back inside. Most of the other humans have left, realizing that their Pokemon have gotten loose.

"What do I do?" you ask yourself again.
11.title: Pikachu's Story

111.content:
"I must!" you decide. "It's for his own good! Sorry Ash, but as your friend, you must let me eat you!"

You head inside and are surprised not to see anyone else. Ash lay on the couch in nothing but a shirt and underwear, as unmoving as a still log. His snoring is very loud, almost ear-rattling. You approach him carefully and quietly.

"He looks so peaceful," you notice. "Zippo said that we need to make humans realize that we're the masters, so maybe I don't have to eat him. Oh, which is the correct choice?"
111.title: Pikachu's Choice

1111.content:
"Oh, I can't do anything to him, he's my friend!" you tell yourself. "I might as well just eat him!"

You examine his body carefully.

"Still, this doesn't feel right," you think. "Should I wake him first and give him a chance?"
1111.title: Wake Up or Let Sleep?

11112.content:
"I should just let him sleep," you sigh. "It's better if he enjoys his last moments of life."

Now you need to decide how you want to eat him. You could try and swallow him whole, though it'd be quite difficult for your small size to consume someone so large.

"I could use my electricity to cook him, it'd be fast, but painful if not done quick enough," you think to yourself. "Ash, I'm sorry for this, but I have to do something."
11112.title: Let a Sleeping Ash Lie

111121.content:
"Alright, Ash, dinnertime!" Pikachu thinks. He bites down on his leg, which tastes very good. He quickly devours Ash.
"Ah, that hit the spot! Now, then, I wonder if there's any dessert here?" Pikchu says. There were 2 choices for dessert: 1 was conveniently Dawn, who was still in the room. Another was to leave the building and hunt for someone else.

111122221211111.content:
"Well, ..." you say, "it goes a bit like this."


(A few minutes of talking later)

"...and that's where you came in, so I'm pretty sure I don't need to go on." you sit, watching the umreon's reaction to your story. After a few seconds she speaks, "Wow, that's a bit to take in right after getting eaten, electrocuted, and spit up." You blush a bit and appologize for that, "If I could have thought of another way I would have." "There's no need for an appology!" she ays with a giggle, "I'm just glad to be safe, thanks. I'm also glad you're still full!" she pokes your bloated, trainer filled gut.

(After a few hours of talking)

"Hey, are you hungry? 'Cause I am!" you say patting your amizingly normal sized stomach. "Wow! howed you digest it so fast!? Something that size should take a few days!!" she says. "Well, I suppose I must have a really fast metabolism or something, 'cause I was done with that Charmeleon in a matter of minutes." you explain, as if it wasn't even remotely surprising. "so?" you ask. "So, what?" "so, are you hungry?" you ask. "Sort of...why?" she answers, you answer her question, "Because I was wondering if you wanted to join me on my next hunt.

(what's her answer?)

1112.content:
You gaze over your trainer for at least twenty minutes, shaking your head in confusion.

"It's no good!" you say. "I could never eat him, no matter what he did. I've got to do something though! If I don't, Zippo surely will."

You kneel down a bit, getting a good look at Ash's face.

"Oh, what do I do now? I can't let him get eaten or killed."
1112.title: Could Never Eat Ash

114.content:
"Hm, maybe if I can just manage a clear shot, I can down these birdies and escape," Pikachu thinks to himself. Little did he know that a Lucario was reading his mind while hiding behind a pillar. The Lucario jumped out, and confronted Pikachu.
"You didn't think we were only gonna leave you with a couple of Pidgeotto's and Starly's watching, did you?" Lucario said with a smirk.
"Uh-oh!" said Pikachu, as Lucario prepared an Aura Storm, and all the birds prepared for Drill attacks. "Which one do I target? Birds of Lucario?"
114.title: Betray the Pokemon and fight against them.

15.content: The story will now be told through the eyes of a human, but which one?
15.title: A Human Character

choices: One of Ash's Pokemons (Any region including Sinnoh)
151.content:
So you decided to be Ash. Good choice after all, he is the hero.

Anyway, you were sleeping in your cot when suddenly you heard a sound coming from the lab. At first you thought it was your Pokemon since you know they were still awake.So you didn't give it much importance and you returned to sleep.

Your sleep didn't last long as you heard that someone was at the door. You wake up and dressed quickly. "Who's there?" you asked. When the door opened it was...
151.title: Ash

1511.content:
In fact it were two humans, your best friends, Misty and Brock.

But something was wrong. As soon as they enter they closed the door and tried to stuck it with anything they could find even pushing the door with their bodies.

"Hey what's wrong with you guys?" you asked as yo saw them.

"Don't and push that bed to the door" shouted Misty.

You do it quick as you felt a bit scare of what happening. You pushed the bed to the door and stuck it. Misty and Brock leaned against the opposite wall to rest a little. Meanwhile you heard that someone was hitting the door to tear it down.

"What is that?" you asked "And what happened to you?" you asked when you they had some scratches in their hands like toothmarks.

"They are our pokemon the ones trying to enter" said Brock

"So why don't you let them to enter?"

"Because they were the ones that attacked us" said Misty.

"What are you talking about?"

"When I was in my room I wake up a little and I saw my Dewgong next to me and I thought he was going to play with me. But when I tried to pat his head, he... bite me. He even lick the blood." said Misty.

"As for me was almost the same except it was Vulpix" said Brock

"Vulpix? Wasn't she with Susie?" you asked.

"Yes but you don't remember I told I found her in the boat that me here? He lend me Vulpix for a time to revive the old moments?"

"So you are saying that they are now trying to get here... to eat you?" you asked.

"Were are afraid so" said Brock.

You couldn't believe what they were saying. At first you thought that it would include... no it was impossible you thought.

The door of the room was now receiving a big attack.

"I think you were right about what you said" you said

"What? You didn't believe us before?" asked Misty.

"Well... no. But that last attack come a volt tackle"

"Are you sure?" asked Brock.

"Yes I cannot be wrong. Then we have to get out of here. I think there is a door there so I suggest you to run" you said as you and your friends walked through that door.

When you enter you press the button of the light and it revealed that it was the kitchen. Then you felt you were not alone because there was a little dark room next to it. You decided to investigate and when you turn the light on it was...
1511.title: In the room

15111.content:
For the luck of everyone it were more humans. This time it were Dawn and Richie.

"Are you OK? you asked as you saw them with some blood.

"More or less. I don't know what happened to Pachirisu. I just wanted to give him a hug and he bite me in the neck" said Dawn.

"And Sparky tried to choke me with one of is lightning attacks" said Richie.

"So that means that Pikachu..." you said.

"Listen we have to get out of here and find a way to stop them" said Misty.

"Maybe we can use the pokeballs to call them back" said Brock.

"That is a great idea but I think we left them in the lab" you said.

"Don't worry Ash we will get there. We just have to find a way to get there without encounter any pokemons" said Richie.

Then they heard that the pokemons were hitting the door where you, Misty and Brock just entered.

"Oh great they are here" said Brock

"Don't worry we can go through the door we used" said Dawn.

But as she reached the door, the door was also hit by pokemons attacks.

"Oh no this side too?" said Misty.

"That attack was too strong" Richie.

"It must be... Buizel" you said.

"Ok now I'm worried" said Dawn.

"Wait look up there. We can use the ventilation system to get to the lab" you said.

"Ok" said the others.

Everyone began to leap on the table and when they reached it the pokemons almost tear down the doors.

"Hurry enter" you said.

The first one to enter was Dawn then Misty, Brock Richie and finally you. By the time you entered the pokemons tear down the doors.

Inside the system...

"Ok now which way?" asked Dawn.

"Just go in a straight line" you said.

Everyone began to crawl through the ventilation system until you felt that something grabbed your legs. It looked like a wine. It were Bayleef and Bulbasaur.

"Hi guys. Please let me go" you said to them. But instead they began to pull you to them.

"Please you don't really want to eat me right?" But as soon as you saw they were seeing you with a hungry grin. You then began to crawl with all your straight but the were pulling stronger than you. You finally decided to cut the vines with a knife you brought and after you were free you crawled as fast as you could falling in a hole where the lab was along with the others.

"Were you were?" asked Misty.

"I was just "tangled" with my pokemons" you said.

"Well we have bad news " said Brock "It seems that the pokemons destroyed the pokeballs"

"Oh great now what?" said Misty

"I suggest we have to survive" said Richie.

"I'm agree too." said Dawn.

"We have to go to a safer place" said Brock.

"But where?"

"Maybe..." you said
15111.title: Encounters

151111.content:
"My house!" Everyone starts to feel a little nervous. "Really Ash? How will we be safe there?"

"My house was covered with security and even comes with it's own LAZAR equipment, right after my mom left!"
You find a peep hole and see out of the lab. the sun is setting, that means that your facing West! You also see pokemon seeming to know that your there...

"My house is North from here hurry!"

Footsteps are heard louder and louder each second that passes.

Everyone starts to crawl furiously through the vent.

"There it is! the end of the vent! I just hope there isn't any pokemon waiting for us..."

You get to the end of the vent and...
151111.title: At the end

choices: Somehow is able to grab a hold of one and threaten to kill it
One Of the pokemon open their mouth and he falls in
1511112.content: Suddenly something grab Richie's arm and he's pulled out of the vent, you hear him screaming in pain and then the sounds of eating. You looked to the others who have fear written all over their faces..you look back to see several Pokemon covered in blood and making their way inside the vent growling and looking as if they were still hungry, Suddenly Brock Charges at the pokemon and
1511112.title: There are pokemon waiting

15111122.content:
The Pokemon opens his mouth wide and suddenly Brock's head goes in The Pokemon's mouth then

Closes down on broke biting him in half spraying blood on the other humans.

Brock goes all the way down and into the stomach.
15111122.title: One Of the pokemon open their mouth and he fall...

choices: they we're glaring at the other Pokémon behind them?
They look hungry is this the end?
151111222.content: Snorlax then swallow's Brock Hole and liking it's lips it trend to the them still hungry. "Run to my house now!" Ash orders them. "But what about Brock?" Dawn asked them. "it's too late now just keep moving!" Misty told her and starting to run. They had tears in their eyes of the memory of Brock being swallowed hole and it pains them to live him there but they have to keep going. "We're almost there." Ash said to them. Ash's house was in site and it looked like the Pokémon we're not here. "we're going to make it." Misty said in joy. They we're then surrounded by Pokémon and have no way out it seems and Ash's Pikachu in front of the house leading half of all their Pokémon as they we're glaring at....
151111222.title: eats him whole

151112.content:
"We need to go somewhere else! A long ways from here, maybe even to another region!"

You suddenly hear something entering the vents.
"Make up your mind Ash!" Misty shouts. "About what?!"
"Which way are we going to go?" "Forward"

The footsteps are getting louder and louder....
Everyone starts moving and you get kicked in the face a few hundred times.

"Hey, watch it Brock!" "Sorry Ash!"
You come to a 4-way cross-way. You hear footsteps coming from the south (where you just came from) and the west.
Misty says," Lets take the East one!" Dawn counters," No! Let's take the Northern one!"
"Ash, we're with you."
Which path will you take?
151112.title: Decisions

info.brief_description: Oak puts Ash in charge of the Pokemon, who unleashes horror when he forgets to feed them.
info.description:
When Prof. Oak leaves on a meeting, he decides to leave in charge of taking care of all the Pokemon at the facility. Ash decides to invite all of his friends and their Pokemon over for a huge party. However, when all is said and done, Ash forgets to feed all of the Pokemon, including his own. The Pokemon decide to take revenge on the humans, and once they escape from their pens, all of Pallet Town becomes a buffet. Humans aren't the only ones at risk, Pokemon who refuse to participate are fair game as well!


RULES:

-Please try to avoid ending the story unless necessary.
-Please use proper grammar.
-I'll allow anything, any type of vore, unbirthing, reformation, scat, watersports, cooking, yiff, etc.
